subSections.title: Alternative forms
subSections.text: Note that in Japanese, the {{w|Jōyō kanji|official version}} of the character is written ⿰[[亻]][[堇]] (the component on the right, [[堇]] is not {{w|Shinjitai|simplified}} to [[𦰌]]). However, handwritten form of ⿰[[亻]][[𦰌]] is allowed. <!--Page 9 of http://www.bunka.go.jp/kokugo_nihongo/sisaku/joho/joho/kijun/naikaku/pdf/joyokanjihyo_20101130.pdf-->

subSections.title: Han character
subSections.text: {{Han char|rn=9|rad=人|as=11|sn=13|four=24214|canj=OTLM|ids=⿰亻堇}} <!-- Not simplified to ⿰亻𦰌 in Japanese -->
